Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands, one in added white, the second in added red; exterior: painted decoration consisting of goat (underbelly and hindquarters remaining) to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 253, pl. 55, no. 404)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0176) (phase 2)
